greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(1 - 4*x + 5*x^2).
comment: Associated to the knot 9_44 by the modified Chebyshev transform A(x) -> (1/(1+x^2)^2)A(x/(1+x^2)). See A099457 and A099458.
Imaginary part of (2+i)^n. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 05 2008; _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jan 06 2009
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Beata Bajorska-Harapińska, Barbara Smoleń, Roman Wituła, On Quaternion Equivalents for Quasi-Fibonacci Numbers, Shortly Quaternaccis, Advances in Applied Clifford Algebras (2019) Vol. 29, 54.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-5).
formula: E.g.f. (with offset 1): exp(x)^2*sin(x). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 06 2009 [corrected by _Joerg Arndt_, Apr 24 2011]
program: (Sage) [lucas_number1(n,4,5) for n in range(1, 29)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 22 2009
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 16 2004
